title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.26 - Non-navigation season storage of floats
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.26 - Non-navigation season storage of floats

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a float shall not leave such float
in the canal system during the closed or winter season without first obtaining
a permit from the Canal Corporation or its representative. Applications for
such permits shall include a description of the proposed place of storage and
must be submitted before the close of the navigation season. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
151.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
